meanings.definition: Not bound by chains or restraints.
meanings.sent1: The wild horse ran freely, unchained and untamed.
meanings.sent2: The dog happily wagged its unchained tail in the park.
meanings.sent3: The kite soared high in the sky, unchained from the ground below.
meanings.sent4: Her unchained laughter filled the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The unchained melody of the piano captivated the audience.

meanings.sent1: The bird flew unchained from its cage, finally free.
meanings.sent2: The prisoner felt unchained after serving his sentence.
meanings.sent3: The unchained balloon drifted away, escaping the grasp of the child.
meanings.sent4: Her unchained spirit refused to be held back by doubts.
meanings.sent5: The unchained prisoner embraced his newfound freedom with gratitude.
